p: The cytotoxicity of the different part extracts of A. absinthium was tested on the breast cancer cell lines (MDA MB-231 & MCF-7) by MTT and lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) assay. The cytotoxic research along with proteome analysis indicate that extract stuffed polymeric nanoparticles (NPs) proficiently prohibits cell proliferation and persuade apoptosis also cell cycle arrest in the G0/G1 stage in both the breast cancer cell lines through appreciably regulating the expression of the key proteins concerned to the proliferation, apoptosis, tumor suppression and vesicular trafficking. (Mughees and Wajid 2019).
